# DocSearch Crawler (Advanced)

- Split content by areas (guides/reference/tutorials) using `tags`.
- Exclude low-value or non-docs pages via `stop_urls`.
- Tune selectors for your theme structure.
- Adjust ranking/typo tolerance with `custom_settings`.
